name: Typeform -> Clearbit -> ClickUp
description: Collecting leads with forms is always beneficial when running an agency, however, qualifying your leads  is alway an important step towards saving a lot of time and money. The qualification process can be easily done with Clearbit, an application which performs a search in order to retrieve out more infromation about a person/business based on their email. Qualified leads are then automatically be added inside a list of your ClickUp account.
